roleset.name: pick out beforehand
roleset.note: PRESELECT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, relation to select.01. No VNcls. (from preselect.01-v)

example.text: Problems with it though are that questions-1 are pre selected *-1 and answers pre written , allowing spin doctors to work on it .

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: THE battle for Greenway will be a repeat showdown of the 2010 federal election after [Jayme Diaz]-1 was preselected *-1 as the Liberal Party's candidate for the vital western Sydney seat on Saturday.
example.arg: as the Liberal Party's candidate for the vital western Sydney seat on Saturday

example.name: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Sounds like he would do more good for your party if you preselected him from your ranks at the next eleciton and made him treasurer.
